Package com.group09.playit.controller

Class RoundController

java.lang.Object
com.group09.playit.controller.RoundController
public class RoundController extends Object
The class Round controller. This class is used to run a round automatically with agents attached for each player. This class functions as the interface between the agents, and the game logic. It can be used to simulate rounds from any given RoundState.
